messages.title: Martin's priorities for our area
messages.content: Martin's priority is a strong local economy providing outstanding education for all, a strong NHS, jobs and apprenticeships to revitalise North Tyneside.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Martin's priority is a strong local economy providing jobs and apprenticeships to revitalise North Tyneside.
Martin's priority includes providing outstanding education for all.
Martin wants real investment for our area, regeneration of the town centres and protection for our precious green spaces.
Martin will be an accessible and accountable local MP who listens and speaks up for our community; standing up for residents and against councillors pay rises.

issues.economy: Martin's priority is a strong local economy.
issues.environment: Protection for our precious green spaces.

quotes.text: INCOME TAX CUT FOR 27 MILLION PEOPLE, REWARDING HARD WORK

images.caption: Martin McGANN standing by a fence in a rural setting.
Martin McGANN talking to a worker.
Martin McGANN posing with a wind turbine in the background.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Peter McManus, on behalf of Martin McGANN, both of 5 Albion Road, North Shields, NE30 2RJ. Printed by leafletfrog; Unit 38-39 Britannia Way, Bolton, BL2 2HH.
